doctor.name: Dr. Khorshed Alam Bakul
doctor.info: Dr. Khorshed Alam Bakul is a Oncologist in Narayanganj. His qualification is MBBS (DMC), BCS (Health), MPhil (Oncology), FCPS (Radiotherapy). He is a Assistant Professor, Radiotherapy at Cumilla Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Popular Diagnostic Center, Narayanganj. Practicing hour of Dr. Khorshed Alam Bakul at Popular Diagnostic Center, Narayanganj is 6:30pm to 9pm (Sat, Mon & Wed).

doctor.name: Dr. Tusar Das
doctor.info: Dr. Tusar Das is a Oncologist in Narayanganj. His qualification is MBBS, BCS (Health), MD (Oncology). He is a Assistant Professor, Oncology at Shaheed Suhrawardy Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Popular Diagnostic Center, Narayanganj. Practicing hour of Dr. Tusar Das at Popular Diagnostic Center, Narayanganj is 6pm to 8pm (Sun, Tue & Thu).
